casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timothy Ray CASEY 133A09-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 6, 2019 Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC Lauren E. Miller, Attorney at Law, Atlanta, for Casey, Timothy Ray

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of February 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of February 2019."
